users.title: Welcome to the Pipeline Cloud
users.about: Walk through this step-by-step guide to calculate how your conversational marketing program will impact leads, pipeline, and boost your top-line revenue.

users.title: ACCOUNT-BASED MARKETING
users.about: Account-Based Marketing (ABM) is on the rise. Every thriving B2B company has an ABM strategy in motion, or plans to launch one soon.

users.title: CONVERSATIONAL SELLING
users.about: Discover strategies, tactics, and best practices for Conversational Selling - a new inbound sales model that is helping Sales Development Reps (SDRs) meet and exceed their goals.

users.title: QUALIFIED SIGNALS
users.about: B2B buying has forever changedâ€”this book will help you get to know a new breed of buyer, understand how to best engage with them (and when), and create a best-in-class buying journey.

users.title: THE B2B BUYER REVOLUTION
users.about: In this book, you'll learn what the Pipeline Cloud is, the technology and motion behind it, the teams that best benefit from it, and how to leverage it at your organization.

users.title: CUSTOMER SPOTLIGHT
users.about: Hear directly from CMOs and marketing leaders in the Salesforce ecosystem on how Conversational Marketing is transforming their buyer engagement strategies.
